title: Jonny Lieberman (Motor Trend)
description: Returning to the podcast Jonny Lieberman (@mt_loverman) of Motor Trend joins us.  This week we have the great G-Wagon debate of 2015 over the Mercedes G63 AMG, Jonny attends the Audi A4 launch, Matt reviews the new turbocharged Ferrari California and VF Engineering Supercharged Lamborghini Huracan, Jonny relays his love for the 2016 Camaro SS and we all wax poetically on California canyons and how not to drive an Lexus RC-F in them.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
